page.title: 13INDUSTRY & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: A small proportion of the population work from home ie. insurance agents, reps., designers etc.Many of the house wives have part-time jobs ie. cleaning, seasonal fruit picking, home helps etc.Several men are self employed particularly as carpenters & decorators.Agriculture is very important.Thomas Williams a long established building firm employs over 70.It specialises in the renovation of Cotswold Stone buildings.It also offers basic services to the local community & the yard is open for the sale of materials.F.W.Williams supplies concrete materials ie.blocks, slabs,swimming pool materials.Antique Restoration strips, repairs & polishes furniture.Banks Fee building firm renovates & converts buildings.A substantial proportion of the village population is retired.
